duties_responsibilities.duty: Maintain the biological samples database and ensure all transactions are documented according to standard operating procedures.
Receive and log samples into the electronic tracking system, ensuring proper labeling and storage.
Act as a point of contact for internal research staff to check in/check out samples, retrieve samples, update the database, receive samples, and return to proper storage.
Prepare samples for shipping and coordinate the shipment of samples to clients, including follow-up on timely receipt.
Archive and dispose of samples properly following standard operating procedures and guidelines.
Monitor environmental temperatures for stored samples, document discrepancies, and assist with problem-solving.
